posts.raw_content:
It lasts a minute or so every Sunday.  

It is not broadcast via loudspeakers five times a day seven days a week.  

No one rolls out prayer mats on Main Street, and we don't have third-world "refugees" shitting in our Town Green or killing our ducks.  

If you want to eat a duck, you have to shoot it while in flight and in season.  

If a mini-poodle takes a dump in The Green, the owner always cleans it up.

I live, currently, in a very civilized society.
posts.author: KuzoKevin
posts.title: I'm listening to Church bells right now in my small New England town...
posts.content:
It lasts a minute or so every Sunday.

It is not broadcast via loudspeakers five times a day seven days a week.

No one rolls out prayer mats on Main Street, and we don't have third-world "refugees" shitting in our Town Green or killing our ducks.

If you want to eat a duck, you have to shoot it while in flight and in season.

If a mini-poodle takes a dump in The Green, the owner always cleans it up.

I live, currently, in a very civilized society.
